## arrayFromZodUnion variable

Converts a Zod union into an array of strings.

**Signature:**

```typescript
arrayFromZodUnion: <S extends z.ZodUnion<readonly [z.ZodTypeAny, ...z.ZodTypeAny[]]>>(schema: S) => {
    error: Error;
    value?: undefined;
} | {
    value: string[];
    error?: undefined;
}
```
